text: akave, avarkal tankal vakkurutikalukku maru ceytatinalum, allahvutaiya vacanankalai avarkal nirakarittatalum, niyayaminri napimarkalaik kolai ceytu kontiruntatalum, ‘‘enkal ullankal tiraiyitappattu vittana. (Akave, evarutaiya upatecamum palanalikkatu) enru avarkal kurivantatalum (nam avarkalaic capittu vittom). Avarkal kuriyataip pol alla! Maraka, allahtan avarkalutaiya nirakarippin karanamaka avarkalutaiya ullankalin mitu muttiraiyittuvittan. Atalal, (avarkalil nallor) cilarait tavira (marravarkal) nampikkai kollave mattarkal
